items.sentence: Tom is worried about what might have happened to Mary.
Tom planted some flowers in the garden this afternoon.
I suspect that Tom and Mary do that from time to time.
Tom turned to the bartender and ordered another drink.
Tom wanted to get as far away from Boston as he could.
Tom was arrested and charged with first degree murder.
Tom was spoiled by his parents, especially his mother.
He returned back home after being away for ten months.
How did they manage to keep this a secret for so long?
Tom is the only person who really knows what happened.
